item.title: Using AWS to Convert a Newsletter to a Static Site
item.description: Components Cloudformation deployment Lambdas DynamoDB for metadata S3 for raw data (html, txt, json, markdown) SQS for batching Hugo How to Crawl a Website Lambda Functions What about updates? Lambdas can be triggered on a cron job
